sentences.en: Additional interviewing and gathering of evidence may be needed to provide the necessary corroboration.
sentences.cn: 另外,如有必要进一步收集证据及面谈.

sentences.en: Additional interviewing and gathering of evidence may be to provide the necessary corroboration.
sentences.cn: 另外,为了进一步证实,有可能还要补充面谈和收集证据.

sentences.en: Definitely more independent corroboration is necessary .
sentences.cn: 有必要更明确地进一步证实。

sentences.en: Definitely more independent corroboration is necessary.
sentences.cn: 有必要更明确地进一步证实.

sentences.en: His possession of the gun is corroboration of his guilt.
sentences.cn: 他藏有枪是他犯罪的又一证据.

sentences.en: Monroe has been able to find corroboration.
sentences.cn: 门罗已经能够找到确证的事实.

sentences.en: The witness was unable to provide corroboration of what he had told the police.
sentences.cn: 证人无法证实他对警方的陈述.

sentences.en: Yet there is no corroboration of the most intriguing reports, such as an attempt to poison the drinks of NATO troops.
sentences.cn: 然而对最有趣的报道却没有得到证实，比如，曾有人试图在北约军队的饮料中下毒。

trans.tran_cn: 进一步的证实，进一步的证据
